title: DevScoop
description: A modern platform for developers to showcase and discover projects, share ideas, and connect with the dev community.

features: Smooth animations with Lottie and Framer Motion
details.challenges: Handling real-time authentication and ensuring smooth animations across devices was challenging.
details.futurePlans: Add social login options and integrate AI-based project recommendations.

title: GardenSpot
description: A friendly web app for gardeners to share tips, explore plant care guides, and build a gardening community.

features: Homepage with banner, featured gardeners, gardening tips, and event winners
Share your own tips with images and descriptions
Firebase authentication with email/password & Google login
Smooth animations with Lottie and Framer Motion
details.challenges: Ensuring seamless image uploads and real-time updates without performance loss.
details.futurePlans: Implement a plant disease detection feature using ML and expand community forums.

title: FitNexus
description: FitNexus is a complete gym management web app that streamlines memberships, scheduling, trainer assignments, and secure payments in one platform.

features: Firebase authentication with Email/Password & Google login
Admin can manage all users, change roles, view transactions, manage classes, and review trainer applications
Trainer can apply to become trainer, manage assigned classes, view earnings, and contribute to forums
Member can book classes, make Stripe payments, submit reviews, and join forums
details.challenges: Managing complex role-based permissions and integrating secure payment gateways.
details.futurePlans: Add mobile app support and AI-based personalized workout plans.
